Display the data in a table [[birttable_overview"> === Overview We will now display the data in a table.
[[birttable_create"> === Create a table Switch from "Data Explorer" to the "Palette". Select the tab "Layout".
image::SNAG-0012.gif" format="gif" />
Drag and drop the table element on the report.
image::SNAG-0015.gif" format="gif" />
Define the following settings for the table.
image::table40.gif" format="gif" />
Change back to the "Data Explorer". And drag and drop the dataset columns into the "Details row" of the table.
image::table50.gif" format="gif" />
The result should look like the following.
image::table60.gif" format="gif" />
Done. You can see a preview of the report if you click on the "Review" Tab. The result should look like the following:
image::table70.gif" format="gif" />
